languages.text: "Зрю ересь! Кто желает покуситься на закон Императора?! Кто смеет поднимать руку на наместницу Его?! Верные, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}умрем за набожную Инцендию, гонительницу скверны{/d}, но не дадим свершиться богохульству!"

"I see heresy! Who is contemplating a strike against the Emperor's law? Who dares raise a hand against His steward? Ye faithful! Let us fight and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}die for the pious Incendia, the banisher of corruption{/d}, lest we allow blasphemy to be committed!"
languages.original_text: "Зрю ересь! Кто желает покуситься на закон Императора?! Кто смеет поднимать руку на наместницу Его?! Верные, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}умрем за набожную Инцендию, гонительницу скверны{/d}, но не дадим свершиться богохульству!"

traits.locale_text: "I see heresy! Who is contemplating a strike against the Emperor's law? Who dares raise a hand against His liege? Ye faithful! Let us fight and die for the pious Incendia, the banisher of corruption, lest we allow blasphemy to be committed!"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "I see heresy! Who is contemplating a strike against the Emperor's law? Who dares raise a hand against His liege? Ye faithful! Let us fight and die for the pious Incendia, the banisher of corruption, lest we allow blasphemy to be committed!"

Let us fight and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}die for the pious Incendia, the banisher of corruption{/d}, lest we allow blasphemy to be committed!"

traits.locale_text: "I see heresy! Who is contemplating a strike against the Emperor's law? Who dares raise a hand against His steward? Ye faithful! Let us fight and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}die for the pious Incendia, the banisher of corruption{/d}, lest we allow blasphemy to be committed!"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “我只看到了异端分子！是谁在反对帝皇的律法？是谁在反对帝皇委任的总管？忠诚的信徒们啊！{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}为虔诚的因森蒂娅，腐化的根除者而战{/d}吧！一起来消灭腐化吧，不能让亵渎的恶行继续蔓延下去！”
languages.original_text: "I see heresy! Who is contemplating a strike against the Emperor's law? Who dares raise a hand against His steward? Ye faithful! Let us fight and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}die for the pious Incendia, the banisher of corruption{/d}, lest we allow blasphemy to be committed!"

traits.locale_text: “我只看到了异端分子！是谁在反对帝皇的律法？是谁在反对帝皇委任的总督？忠诚的信徒们啊！为虔诚的因森蒂娅而战吧！一起来消灭腐化吧，不能让亵渎的恶行继续蔓延下去！”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「異端だ！皇帝の法に反するものは誰だ？領主様に逆おうとするのは誰だ？忠実な者たちよ！{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}腐敗を追放した、信心深いインセンディアのために共に戦い、死のうではないか{/d}！犯される冒涜を許すな！」
languages.original_text: "I see heresy! Who is contemplating a strike against the Emperor's law? Who dares raise a hand against His steward? Ye faithful! Let us fight and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}die for the pious Incendia, the banisher of corruption{/d}, lest we allow blasphemy to be committed!"

traits.locale_text: 「異端だ！皇帝の法に反するものは誰だ？領主様に逆おうとするのは誰だ？忠実な者たちよ！{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}腐敗を追放した、信心深いインセンディアのために共に戦い、死のうではないか{/d}！犯される冒涜を許すな！」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «¡Veo herejía! ¿Quién contempla un ataque contra la ley del Emperador? ¿Quién se atreve a levantarle un mano a Su guardiana? ¡Fieles! Luchemos y {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}muramos por la piadosa Incendia, desterradora de la corrupción{/d}. ¡No permitamos la blasfemia!».
languages.original_text: "I see heresy! Who is contemplating a strike against the Emperor's law? Who dares raise a hand against His steward? Ye faithful! Let us fight and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}die for the pious Incendia, the banisher of corruption{/d}, lest we allow blasphemy to be committed!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Veo herejía! ¿Quién contempla un ataque contra la ley del Emperador? ¿Quién se atreve a levantarle un mano a Su señor? ¡Fieles! Luchemos y muramos por la piadosa Incendia, desterradora de la corrupción. ¡No permitamos la blasfemia!».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich sehe Ketzerei! Wer plant hier einen Schlag gegen das Gesetz des Imperators? Wer wagt es, eine Hand gegen seinen Truchsess zu erheben? Ihr Gläubigen! {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}Lasst uns für die fromme Incendia kämpfen und sterben, die Verbannerin der Verderbnis{/d}, sonst entsteht Blasphemie!"
languages.original_text: "I see heresy! Who is contemplating a strike against the Emperor's law? Who dares raise a hand against His steward? Ye faithful! Let us fight and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}die for the pious Incendia, the banisher of corruption{/d}, lest we allow blasphemy to be committed!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe Ketzerei! Wer plant hier einen Schlag gegen das Gesetz des Imperators? Wer wagt es, eine Hand gegen seinen Lehnsherren zu erheben? Ihr Gläubigen! Lasst uns für die fromme Incendia kämpfen und sterben, die Verbannerin der Verderbnis, sonst entsteht Blasphemie!"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Hérétique ! Qui fomente un complot contre la loi de l'Empereur ? Qui ose lever la main contre Son Intendante ? Fidèles ! Combattons et {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}mourons pour Incendia la vertueuse, le fléau de la corruption{/d} ! Nous ne devons pas laisser commettre un blasphème ! »
languages.original_text: "I see heresy! Who is contemplating a strike against the Emperor's law? Who dares raise a hand against His steward? Ye faithful! Let us fight and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}die for the pious Incendia, the banisher of corruption{/d}, lest we allow blasphemy to be committed!"

traits.locale_text: « Hérétique ! Qui fomente un complot contre la loi de l'Empereur ? Qui ose lever la main contre Sa suzeraine ? Fidèles ! Combattons et mourons pour Incendia la vertueuse, le fléau de la corruption ! Nous ne devons pas laisser commettre un blasphème ! »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Gördüğüm şey kâfirlik! İmparatorluk'un kanunlarına karşı başkaldırı tertip eden kim? O'nun bir idarecisine el kaldırmaya cüret eden kim? Ey inananlar! Hep birlikte savaşalım ve {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}yozlaşmanın yok edicisi, inanç abidesi İncendia uğruna ölelim{/d} ki bu din dışılığa bir dur diyebilelim!"
languages.original_text: "I see heresy! Who is contemplating a strike against the Emperor's law? Who dares raise a hand against His steward? Ye faithful! Let us fight and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}die for the pious Incendia, the banisher of corruption{/d}, lest we allow blasphemy to be committed!"

traits.locale_text: "Gördüğüm şey kâfirlik! İmparatorluk'un kanunlarına karşı başkaldırı tertip eden kim? O'nun bir idarecisine el kaldırmaya cüret eden kim? Ey inananlar! Hep birlikte savaşalım ve {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_HieronimusNotAlly}yozlaşmanın yok edicisi, inanç abidesi İncendia uğruna ölelim{/d} ki işlenen günahlara bir dur diyebilelim!"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
